scenario_text.value:
We spotted an unfamiliar monster a few
moments ago.

So it could be a monster that doesn’t like
us, or even another one of the enemies?

Yeah...
It didn’t seem all that dangerous, though.

We should look for it, just in case.
Where did you see it?
Over there... You mean the hall?

Okay! You two hide. There’s no telling what
might happen!

An unfamiliar monster was over in the hall.
It might be already gone, though.
